record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR--H.R. 6304
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR--H.R. 6304 -- (Senate - July 08, 2008)

[Page: S6448]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that during the Senate's consideration of the FISA Amendments Act, Beckett Jackson, Ross Schulman, and Alex Tausanovitch, interns in my Judiciary Committee office, be granted the privilege of the floor.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Matthew Pedilla, who is an intern in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor during the pendency of this discussion.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Sara Love Swaney, who is a member of my staff, be given floor privileges for the remainder of the day.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
